activities: Telerik processed personal information to fulfill orders, process payments, improve products, provide customer and product support, marketing, and additional activities as more fully set forth in its privacy policy under: Use, Sharing, or Disclosing of Information.

orgverification: In-house with support from outside counsel
personaldata: Telerik processes personal information from visitors to its websites, clients, customers, and employees.
